description.en:
Mission:
Providing web3 businesses the resources they need to easily launch and manage their tokens.

Vision:
The Token Management System (TMS) requires no-code so that building and managing a web3 business becomes accessible to all.

Vision (Long - Product vision):
Decubate Token Management System (TMS) exists out of a suite of connected white-labeled management tools for minting, vesting, token/nft staking, governance, tiers system, liquidity farming, on-chain statistics, and much more. TMS enables innovators to interact with any EVM-compatible blockchain through our highly intuitive, customizable, and incredibly easy to deploy solutions.
